Queries.AddBikeInfo: INSERT INTO ct_db.bikeinfo (B_ID, B_Chng_Date, B_KM_ODO, B_Mobile_Go, B_Next_ODO, B_Insrt_Person) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?);
Queries.UpdateBikeData: UPDATE ct_db.bikeinfo SET B_KM_ODO = @B_KM_ODO, B_Mobile_Go = @B_Mobile_Go, B_Next_ODO = @B_Next_ODO, B_Updt_Person = @B_Updt_Person WHERE B_ID = @B_ID;
Queries.AddMarketInfo: INSERT INTO ct_db.market (M_ID, M_Date, M_Amount, M_Insrt_Person) VALUES (@M_ID, @M_Date, @M_Amount, @M_Insrt_Person);
Queries.UpdateMarketData: UPDATE ct_db.market SET M_Amount = @M_Amount, M_Updt_Person = @M_Updt_Person WHERE M_ID = @M_ID;
